channel.title: When Running server, says "Server is already in use"
channel.description:
Hello...topic explains all sos.
Anyways, yah im using Pk planet's source, and v6 client.
When I try to run the server in source files, it says "Server is already in use" ______________ Please help,
Best regards,
Kletzi101

item.title: When Running server, says "Server is already in use"
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

do u already have another server running? if not try opening a diff port like 43595 and see if it will run on that 1.

Read full topic
item.source: When Running server, says "Server is already in use"
